text: The Plague (original title: La Peste) is a 1992 Argentine British French drama movie directed by Luis Puenzo and was based on the 1947 novel of the same name by Albert Camus. It stars William Hurt, Sandrine Bonnaire, Raul Julia, Robert Duvall, Jean-Marc Barr, Horacio Fontova, Victoria Tennant, China Zorrilla, Norman Briski. ==Other websites== * * Category:1992 drama movies Category:Argentine drama movies Category:1990s British drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Luis Puenzo
title: The Plague (1992 movie)
